00199 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00201 #define PARAM_SPIx(n)   (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_SPI))
00202 
00204 #define PARAM_SPI_CPHA(n)       ((n==SPI_CPHA_FIRST) || (n==SPI_CPHA_SECOND))
00205 
00207 #define PARAM_SPI_CPOL(n)       ((n==SPI_CPOL_HI) || (n==SPI_CPOL_LO))
00208 
00210 #define PARAM_SPI_MODE(n)       ((n==SPI_SLAVE_MODE) || (n==SPI_MASTER_MODE))
00211 
00213 #define PARAM_SPI_DATA_ORDER(n) ((n==SPI_DATA_MSB_FIRST) || (n==SPI_DATA_LSB_FIRST))
00214 
00216 #define PARAM_SPI_DATABIT(n)    ((n==SPI_DATABIT_16) || (n==SPI_DATABIT_8) \
00217 || (n==SPI_DATABIT_9) || (n==SPI_DATABIT_10) \
00218 || (n==SPI_DATABIT_11) || (n==SPI_DATABIT_12) \
00219 || (n==SPI_DATABIT_13) || (n==SPI_DATABIT_14) \
00220 || (n==SPI_DATABIT_15))
00221 
00223 #define PARAM_SPI_STAT(n)       ((n==SPI_STAT_ABRT) || (n==SPI_STAT_MODF) \
00224 || (n==SPI_STAT_ROVR) || (n==SPI_STAT_WCOL) \
00225 || (n==SPI_STAT_SPIF))
